text:
The #coronavirus didn’t pause for the 36 million Americans who've lost their jobs. 

And It isn’t pausing for the thousands who are being infected and dying each week because we still don't have the testing and contact tracing we need. 

We must act for our heroes now. https://t.co/SFZZbwYgEa
